text: NIRMANA NEWS is an Indian television news channel. It is a part of the wider Gujarati, a subsidiary of the NIRMANA NEWS. Nirman news is not available on tatasky ==See also== * List of Indian television stations * Zee Gujarati ==References== ==External links== * official website Category:Television stations in Mumbai Category:Television channels and stations established in 2014 Category:Gujarati-language television channels in India
title: Nirmana News
